name: Super Pong (Zaney)
description:
Super Pong is the modern evolution of the classic game Pong, where unique power-ups can change how the game is played. Two players go head-to-head with power-ups that allow the player to change the physics of their paddle or alter the way they hit the ball. The ruleset is the same as Pong, where a player has to score 11 points and be up by 2 to win the game.

Left Player Controls

[Movement]

W: move the paddle up

S: move the paddle down

[Power-Ups]

A: activate Fast Ball

Q: activate Curve Ball

E: activate Grow Paddle

D: activate Speed Paddle

Right Player Controls

[Movement]

I: move the paddle up

K: move the paddle down

[Power-Ups]

J: activate Fast Ball

U: activate Curve Ball

O: activate Grow Paddle

L: activate Speed Paddle
